sources.title: Kill Kane | Full Crime Thriller Movie | Vinnie Jones
sources.description:
Kill Kane - A teacher's world is torn apart when his wife and children are murdered at the hands of a ruthless gang.  Left for dead and with no one to turn to, he takes matters into his own hands and hits the streets in search of justice.
2016.  Stars: Vinnie Jones, Nicole Faraday, Sebastian Street

metadata.Plot: A teacher's world is torn apart when his wife and children are brutally murdered at the hands of a ruthless gang. Left for dead and with no one to turn to, he takes matters into his own hands and hits the streets in search of justice.
metadata.Writer: Christian Sellers, Andrew Jones, Adam Stephen Kelly
metadata.Actors: Vinnie Jones, Nicole Faraday, Sebastian Street
